amendment.description: To modify the exclusion from officer distribution and strength limitations of officers serving in intelligence community positions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1567 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1567 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S12589-12595) To modify the exclusion from officer distribution and strength limitations of officers serving in intelligence community positions.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1567 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1567 proposed by Senator Warner.
